value.string:
"""Set automatic references on the document.
 """
 
 transaction = state_change['object']
 
 # Get sections.
 source_section = None
 source_section_value = transaction.getSourceSectionValue()
 if source_section_value is not None \
 and source_section_value.getPortalType() == 'Organisation':
 source_section_value = \
 source_section_value.Organisation_getMappingRelatedOrganisation()
 source_section = source_section_value.getRelativeUrl()
 
 destination_section = None
 destination_section_value = transaction.getDestinationSectionValue()
 if destination_section_value is not None \
 and destination_section_value.getPortalType() == 'Organisation':
 destination_section_value = \
 destination_section_value.Organisation_getMappingRelatedOrganisation()
 destination_section = destination_section_value.getRelativeUrl()
 
 id_generator = state_change.getPortal().portal_ids.generateNewId
 previous_id_getter = state_change.getPortal().portal_ids.getLastGeneratedId
 
 # Invoice Reference is automatically filled only for Sale Invoice Transaction.
 if transaction.getPortalType() == 'Sale Invoice Transaction':
 if not transaction.getReference():
 invoice_id_group = ('accounting', 'invoice', source_section)
 invoice_reference = id_generator(id_generator='uid',
 id_group=invoice_id_group,
 default=previous_id_getter(invoice_id_group,
 default=0) + 1)
 transaction.setReference(invoice_reference)
 
 
 # Generate new values for Source Reference and Destination Reference.
 if not transaction.getSourceReference():
 period = transaction.AccountingTransaction_getAccountingPeriodForSourceSection()
 period_code = ''
 if period is not None:
 period_code = period.getShortTitle() or period.getTitle() or ''
 if not period_code:
 period_code = str(transaction.getStartDate().year())
 source_id_group = ('accounting', 'section', source_section, period_code)
 source_reference = id_generator(id_generator='uid',
 id_group=source_id_group,
 default=previous_id_getter(source_id_group,
 default=0) + 1)
 transaction.setSourceReference('%s-%s' % (period_code, source_reference))
 
 if not transaction.getDestinationReference():
 period = transaction.AccountingTransaction_getAccountingPeriodForDestinationSection()
 period_code = ''
 if period is not None:
 period_code = period.getShortTitle() or period.getTitle() or ''
 if not period_code:
 period_code = str(transaction.getStopDate().year())
 destination_id_group = ('accounting', 'section', destination_section, period_code)
 destination_reference = id_generator(id_generator='uid',
 id_group=destination_id_group,
 default=previous_id_getter(destination_id_group,
 default=0) + 1)
 transaction.setDestinationReference('%s-%s' % (period_code, destination_reference))
